description:
The Universe Web Browser is your premier open source web browser for the HP webOS platform.

It provides a simple yet feature rich browsing experience.

Some of the included features are:
∙ Open card search
∙ Download manager
∙ Bookmark folders
∙ Voogle integration
∙ Twitter and Read It Later integration
  ∙ Neato! and Instapaper coming in v1.1
∙ Private Browsing
∙ Screen Rotation Lock
∙ Customizable Navigation icons

New in this version!
1.0.5:
∙ Fix for preventing empty "ghost" bookmarks.
∙ More Google Bookmarks login debug info.
1.0.4:
∙ YouTube video and Google Map redirection bug fixed.
∙ Issue typing into address bar after enter text into a text field fixed.
∙ Empty folder name bug fixed.

When sending debug info for Google Bookmarks: If the dialog box that pops up after login says to check your user name and password and you know that it is correct, please email support@openmobl.com with the Error message and params that are displayed in the parenthesis and brackets.

Please note: Google Bookmarks does not have a public API. This feature can be broken at any time by Google. Emailing support@openmobl.com when this happens will result in prompt action to update Universe.

Please keep an eye out for frequent updates!

Universe runs on HP webOS version 1.4.5 and up on the Pre, Pre Plus, Pre 2 and Pixi hardware.

For support inquiries and feature requests, please email support@openmobl.com. View the Tips & Tricks online at http://support.openmobl.com/.

Released under the Mozilla Public License v1.1 and the GNU General Public License v2. Some percentage of profits go towards webOS Internals and other webOS Homebrew efforts.
